titleStmt.title: Barley-breake, or, A vvarning for vvantons. Written by W.N. Gent
titleStmt.author: W. N., Gent.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Simon Stafford, dwelling in the Cloth-fayre, neere the red Lyon,
